ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] The only good dragon...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh.  Most of you probably noticed the network glitches last night.  Well, guess when they happened for us?  We finally managed to break into fear on our
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 17 Mar 2000, Miriana wrote:
>
> We buff up for Vox and run in, 20 seconds into the fight, 80% of
> our healers get bugged by her fear or went LD. That's right -> 80% <-. I
> got fear bugged with 90% mana along with 3 or 4 others and a few went LD.
> We had 3 functioning healers that entire battle. Well, we still got Lady
> Vox down to a sliver before our damage output dropped to nothing.

Heh. Most of you probably noticed the network glitches last
night. Well, guess when they happened for us? We finally
managed to break into fear on our third try without everyone
getting killed at zone-in. We'd looted most of our equipment
and were forming groups. The monk brings in the mobs he's led
away, so all we have to do is kill these 3 shiverbacks and
scareling and the enchanter already has the scareling mezed,
and...

40% of the group goes LD.

Oh well, at least we managed to break in on our fourth
attempt.

> Actually, Vox was very similar in items. Nag's CoF -> Vox's RBB.
> Nag's scale -> Vox's scale. 2 GPK's -> 2 weight reducing pouches....
> err... Nevermind :).

I also helped Rokenn's guild with Nagafen (well, if you can
call keeping Elemental Rhythms up for about 15 seconds to
resist 3 fear attempts before Nag fell helping). He dropped
the druid crook, shaman hammer, orb if tishan (I passed),
gauntlets of fiery might, and *two* cloaks of flames.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
